name: Backstab
text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Counterfeit Coin
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

name: Preparation
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Shadowstep
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It_costs (2) less.
flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

name: Bazaar Burglary
text: [x]Quest: Add 4 cards from\nother classes to your hand.\nReward: Ancient Blades.
flavor: Just when you set up your "All-Natural Scented Candles" at the farmer's market and then some STUPID KOBOLD COMES AND TAKES THEM ALL!

name: Blackjack Stunner
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, return a minion to its owner's hand. It costs (1) more.
flavor: "I'm about to ruin this 10-cost minion's whole career."

name: Bladed Cultist
text: Combo: Gain +1/+1.
flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

name: Bloodsail Flybooter
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
flavor: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

name: Buccaneer
text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

name: Conceal
text: Give your minions Stealth until your next_turn.
flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

name: Daring Escape
text: Return all friendly minions to your hand.
flavor: Impossible to cast without cackling evilly.

name: Deadly Poison
text: Give your weapon +2_Attack.
flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

name: Doomerang
text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to_your hand.
flavor: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

name: Dragon's Hoard
text: Discover a Legendary_minion from another class.
flavor: The Alliance loves this hoard.

name: Find the Imposter
text: Questline: Play 2\nSI:7 cards.\nReward: Add a Spy Gizmo to your hand.
flavor: My money is on the evil advisor to the king.

name: Hallucination
text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

name: Journey Below
text: Discover a Deathrattle card.
flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

name: Kingsbane
text: [x]Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
flavor: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

name: Leeching Poison
text: Give your weapon Lifesteal this turn.
flavor: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

name: Paralytic Poison
text: [x]Give your weapon +1\nAttack and "Your hero is\nImmune while attacking."
flavor: The hammer is overkill.

name: Pharaoh Cat
text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your_hand.
flavor: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

name: Pilfer
text: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
flavor: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Pit Snake
text: Poisonous
flavor: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Plague of Madness
text: Each player equips\na 2/2 Knife with Poisonous.
flavor: Don't bring a candle to a knife fight.

name: Pogo-Hopper
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for\neach other Pogo-Hopper\nyou played this game.
flavor: Once you hop, you just can't stop!

name: Praise Galakrond!
text: [x]Give a minion +1 Attack.\nInvoke Galakrond.
flavor:
"Turn to Galakrond, Chapter 3 Verse 12.

'SNARL! ROAR! GRAAAAGH!'

Let us reflect on this wisdom."

name: Prize Plunderer
text: [x]Combo: Deal 1 damage to\na minion for each other card\nyou've played this turn.
flavor: But he'll never be able to plunder the prize of a happy childhood.

name: Savory Deviate Delight
text: [x]Transform a minion in\nboth players' hands into a\nPirate or Stealth minion.
flavor: "Savory" is a creative way to put it.

name: Secret Passage
text: Replace your hand with 4 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
flavor: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

name: Serrated Tooth
text: Deathrattle: Give your minions Rush.
flavor: The tooth hurts, don’t it?

name: SI:7 Extortion
text: Tradeable\nDeal $3 damage to an undamaged character.
flavor: "It's a dangerous world out there. It'd be a shame if your protection insurance were to suddenly run out…"

name: Sinister Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to the_enemy hero.
flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

name: Spymistress
text: Stealth
flavor: Spies in Outland must blend into the environment. That means hot-pink gear and bright green hair. It’s a weird place.

name: Swashburglar
text: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
flavor: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

name: The Caverns Below
text: [x]Quest: Play four minions\nwith the same name.\nReward: Crystal Core.
flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

name: Togwaggle's Scheme
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle @ |4(copy, copies) of it into your deck.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

name: Yoink!
text: Discover a Hero Power and set its Cost to (0). Swap back after 2 uses.
flavor: Saying the spell’s name makes it work better.

name: Ambush
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 2/3 Ambusher with Poisonous.
flavor: Clip-clop clip-clop CLIP-CLOP STAB!

name: Ashtongue Slayer
text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +3 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: Her other hand attachments include a corkscrew and a bottle opener.

name: Bamboozle
text: [x]Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, transform it into a random one that costs (3) more.
flavor: "WE DO YOU A BAMBOOZLE, HOOMAN!"

name: Betrayal
text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

name: Biteweed
text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.
flavor: AKA Edwin VanLeaf.

name: Blade Flurry
text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemies.
flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

name: Bloodsail Howler
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Pirate you control.
flavor:
They saw their fate a closin'
Aboard a pirate ship
On deck: The Howlin' Hozen
About to let one rip.

name: Cavern Shinyfinder
text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon from your deck.
flavor: They call her the candled vandal.

name: Cheap Shot
text: Echo\n Deal $2 damage to a_minion.
flavor: 50% off. Every shot must go!

name: Cheat Death
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.\nIt costs (2) less.
flavor: Reported.

name: Clever Disguise
text: Add 2 random spells from another class to_your hand.
flavor: "It me! Togwaggle!"

name: Cold Blood
text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

name: Cutpurse
text: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
flavor: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

name: Defias Ringleader
text: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

name: Dirty Tricks
text: [x]Secret: After your\nopponent casts a spell,\ndraw 2 cards.
flavor: "Ahh sand in my eyes! Also, I'm being stabbed."

name: Efficient Octo-bot
text: Frenzy: Reduce the cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Pull the lever, Octo-bot... Wrong leverrrrr!

name: Evasion
text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
flavor: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

name: Eviscerate
text: Deal $2 damage. Combo: Deal $4 damage instead.
flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

name: Foxy Fraud
text: Battlecry: Your next\nCombo card this turn costs_(2) less.
flavor: His other street con involves a druid. He can't pull it off without a plant.

name: Gadgetzan Ferryman
text: Combo: Return a friendly minion to your hand.
flavor: Is it just me, or is there something fishy about that ferryman?

name: Gang Up
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
flavor: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Garrote
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to the
enemy hero. Shuffle 3
Bleeds into your deck that
deal $2 more when drawn.
flavor: "I don't have money… but what I do have is a particular set of skills."

name: Goblin Auto-Barber
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

name: Jade Shuriken
text: Deal $2 damage.\nCombo: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Deal $2 damage.\nCombo: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavor: Good news is, after you remove it from your wound, you can use it to pay your medical bills!

name: Jade Swarmer
text: Stealth\nDeathrattle: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Stealth\nDeathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavor: He's so good at swarming, he can swarm all by himself!

name: Lab Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 copies of a friendly minion into your deck.
flavor: Join the chemistry lab! We've got all the solutions.

name: Maestra of the Masquerade
text: You start the game as a different class until you play a Rogue card.
flavor: She doesn't drop character until after the DVD commentary.

name: One-eyed Cheat
text: Whenever you summon a Pirate, gain Stealth.
flavor: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

name: Patient Assassin
text: Stealth\n Poisonous
flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

name: Pick Pocket
text: Echo\nAdd a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor: He'll pick anyone's pocket, except a gnome's. He'd never stoop so low.

name: Plagiarize
text: Secret: At the end of your opponent's turn, add copies of the cards they played to your hand.
flavor: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

name: Razorpetal Lasher
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a\nRazorpetal to your hand\nthat deals 1 damage.
flavor: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

name: Razorpetal Volley
text: Add two Razorpetals to_your hand that deal_1 damage.
flavor: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

name: Roll the Bones
text: Draw a card.\nIf it has Deathrattle, cast this again.
flavor: Call it: Heads or Tailbone…

name: Sap
text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

name: Shadow Clone
text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it with_Stealth.
flavor: "You thought you were attacking face, but it was me! You!"

name: Shadowjeweler Hanar
text: [x]After you play a Secret,\nDiscover a Secret from\na different class.
flavor: What is a shadowjeweler? A miserable little pile of secrets.

name: Shenanigans
text: Secret: When your opponent draws their second card in a turn, transform it into a Banana.
flavor: It's not personal, it's just monkey business.

name: Shiv
text: Deal $1 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

name: Silverleaf Poison
text: [x]Give your weapon\n"After your hero attacks,\ndraw a card."
flavor: Kazakus has taken to a more direct approach in recent times.

name: Skyvateer
text: Stealth\nDeathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: When you go without fruits in an airship, you get a nasty case of skyvy.

name: Stolen Steel
text: Discover a weapon (from another class).
flavor: Because Thrall wouldn't lend me Doomhammer.

name: Sudden Betrayal
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of_its neighbors.
flavor: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

name: Sweet Tooth
text: Corrupt: Gain +2 Attack and Stealth.
flavor: He's been eyeballing that ice cream cone all day!

name: Swindle
text: Draw a spell.\nCombo: And a minion.
flavor: You know, it's probably just cheaper to find a place that sells the plushie…

name: Tenwu of the Red Smoke
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (1) this turn.
flavor: Red, the color of subtlety.

name: Underbelly Fence
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na card from another class,\n_gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: She’ll take anything you have—except scruples and a good work ethic.

name: Undercity Huckster
text: Deathrattle: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

name: Undercity Valiant
text: Combo: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

name: Vanessa VanCleef
text: Combo: Add a copy of the last card your opponent played to your hand.
flavor: Some people collect stamps or flowers. She collects enemies.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Rogue.

name: Violet Haze
text: Add 2 random Deathrattle cards to_your hand.
flavor: Elite Tauren Chieftain's next hit single.

name: Waxmancy
text: Discover a Battlecry minion. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: The waxmancer works with flame and form, giving shape to figures warm. \n\nSome think he's a crazy creeper, but crafting minions is simply cheaper.

name: Whirlkick Master
text: Whenever you play a Combo card, add a random Combo card to your hand.
flavor: C-c-combo!

name: Wicked Stab (Rank 1)
text: Deal $2 damage. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Always go for the glowing weak point.

name: Akama
text: [x]Stealth\nDeathrattle: Shuffle 'Akama\nPrime' into your deck.
flavor: "To many of my people, I am known as a traitor... as Illidan's lapdog. I will remain in the shadows, for now... Actually, maybe I'll just remain in the shadows forever."

name: Beneath the Grounds
text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

name: Blink Fox
text: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor: It's like, SUPER bad at staring contests.

name: Burgle
text: Add 2 random cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Yoink!

name: Cloak of Shadows
text: Give your hero Stealth for 1 turn.
flavor: Only worthy emperors can see the cloak.

name: Coerce
text: Destroy a damaged minion. Combo: Destroy any minion.
flavor: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

name: Cogmaster's Wrench
text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

name: Cutthroat Buccaneer
text: Combo: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor: In life he worked as a sword swallower.

name: Deadly Fork
text: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
flavor: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Edwin VanCleef
text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each card played earlier this turn.
flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

name: Envenom Weapon
text: Give your weapon Poisonous.
flavor: Like Deadly Poison, but deadlier.

name: EVIL Miscreant
text: Combo: Add two random Lackeys to your hand.
flavor: Because there are no G.O.O.D. Miscreants.

name: Face Collector
text: Echo\nBattlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor: “I’ll trade you a Malfurion for an Anduin.”

name: Fan of Knives
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw_a card.
flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

name: Field Contact
text: [x]After you play a Battlecry\nor Combo card, draw a card.
flavor: That's not a knife... THIS is a knife!

name: Greyheart Sage
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Stealthed minion,\ndraw 2 cards.
flavor: "What am I drinking again?"

name: Headcrack
text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

name: Hooked Scimitar
text: [x]Combo: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: Oooooooooooow. I'm hooked on a scimitar!

name: Iron Sensei
text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavor: Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.\n\n0110100001101001

name: Loan Shark
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your\nopponent a Coin.\n__Deathrattle: You get two.
flavor: Pay up or you'll be swimming with the fishes.

name: Mimic Pod
text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Jinx!

name: Necrium Blade
text: Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion.
flavor: Grab death by the handle.

name: Perdition's Blade
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

name: Plague Scientist
text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

name: Raiding Party
text: Draw 2 Pirates from_your deck.\nCombo: And a weapon.
flavor: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

name: Seal Fate
text: Deal $3 damage to an undamaged character. Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Firmly press the seal of your fates instead of leaving the flap open.

name: Self-Sharpening Sword
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: You no longer have to bring a stack of #2 swords to a test!

name: Shadow Rager
text: Stealth
flavor: WE WENT THERE!

name: Shadow Strike
text: Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character.
flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

name: Shadowblade
text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
flavor: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

name: Shady Dealer
text: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.
flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

name: Shaku, the Collector
text: [x]Stealth. Whenever this attacks, add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Aya even staged an intervention once, but Shaku still insists that he is not a hoarder.

name: Shroud of Concealment
text: Draw 2 minions. Any played this turn gain Stealth for 1 turn.
flavor: This page left intentionally blank.

name: SI:7 Agent
text: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

name: SI:7 Operative
text: Rush\nAfter this attacks a minion, gain Stealth.
flavor: What do you mean you're out of ponies?

name: Sketchy Information
text: [x]Draw a Deathrattle card\nthat costs (4) or less.\nTrigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: "I trust the Forsaken as far as I can smell them. Which, I guess is actually pretty far."

name: Sonya Shadowdancer
text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
flavor: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

name: Sparkjoy Cheat
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Secret, cast it and draw a card.
flavor: "These do NOT spark joy!"

name: Swinetusk Shank
text: [x]After you play a Poison,\n_gain +1 Durability.
flavor: Comes with a rack of ribs!

name: Ticket Master
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 Tickets into your deck. When drawn, summon a 3/3 Plush Bear.
flavor: You can exchange one ticket for a bear or save up thousands for a tacky light-up paperweight!

name: Unearthed Raptor
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its_Deathrattle.
flavor: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.
howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Vulpera Toxinblade
text: Your weapon has +2_Attack.
flavor: The blade works well enough on its own… but this is just in case.

name: Water Moccasin
text: [x]Stealth\nHas Poisonous while you\n_have no other minions.
flavor: You need to be specific when you're ordering waterproof shoewear.

name: Academic Espionage
text: Shuffle 10 cards from your opponent's class into your deck. They_cost (1).
flavor: The tenth Pyroblast really felt like overkill.

name: Anub'ar Ambusher
text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Apothecary Helbrim
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Poison to your hand.
flavor: The best way to maintain your health is to poison everyone else.

name: Assassin's Blade
flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

name: Assassinate
text: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

name: Blightnozzle Crawler
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Ooze with Poisonous and Rush.
flavor: "Well we HAD it contained. Then you went and gave it legs!"

name: Counterfeit Blade
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain a random\nfriendly Deathrattle that\n_triggered this game.
flavor: Don't worry, the blade retracts into the handle!

name: Elven Minstrel
text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

name: Fal'dorei Strider
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor: She’s more of a rat burglar.

name: Infiltrator Lilian
text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

name: Kobold Illusionist
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

name: Lilian Voss
text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
flavor: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

name: Master of Disguise
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth.
flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

name: Mistwraith
text: Whenever you play an Echo_card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: One little Mistwraith sitting in a tree. M-I-S-T-I-N-G.

name: Necrium Apothecary
text: Combo: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck and gain its Deathrattle.
flavor: Necrium: Get the afterlife without the aftertaste!

name: Obsidian Shard
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each\ncard you've played from\nanother class.
flavor: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh!  Dagger!”

name: Oil Rig Ambusher
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.\nIf this entered your hand\n_this turn, deal 4 instead.
flavor: Days since last accident: 0

name: Plaguebringer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
flavor: One sip and you've got the grippe.

name: Poisoned Blade
text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

name: Runeforge Haunter
text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
flavor: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

name: Sabotage
text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Combo: And your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!

name: Sahket Sapper
text: Deathrattle: Return a _random enemy minion to_ your_opponent's_hand.
flavor: "Here, you dropped this."

name: Scabbs Cutterbutter
text: [x]Combo: The next two\ncards you play this turn\ncost (3) less.
flavor: "Never lie, steal, cheat, or drink. Unless you're compelled to, that is…" —Scabbs Cutterbutter

name: Shadow of Death
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
flavor: Making new friends takes skill.

name: Shadow Sensei
text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +2/+2.
flavor: He used to be Aya's tutor, but she fired him for bugging her too much.

name: Sherazin, Corpse Flower
text: Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Play 4 cards in a turn to revive this minion.
flavor: A Tortollan gardener's worst nightmare.

name: Shifty Sophomore
text: Stealth\nSpellburst: Add a Combo card to your hand.
flavor: Experienced enough to do crimes, inexperienced enough to be super obvious about it.

name: SI:7 Informant
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each SI:7 card you've played this game.
flavor: Sitting in a tavern all day and looking scary is hard work, but somebody has to do it.

name: Southsea Squidface
text: Deathrattle: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

name: Spectral Cutlass
text: [x]Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

name: Spirit of the Shark
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour minions' Battlecries\n__and Combos trigger twice._
flavor: It has Stealth, but its ominous theme music keeps giving it away.

name: Steeldancer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random\nminion with Cost equal to\nyour weapon's Attack.
flavor: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.
flavor: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

name: Tomb Pillager
text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavor: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

name: Umbral Skulker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, add 3 Coins to\nyour hand.
flavor: "Three gold?! Do you have any idea how long this quest chain was?"

name: Vendetta
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
flavor: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

name: Waggle Pick
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

name: Walk the Plank
text: Destroy an undamaged minion.
flavor: Pirates will fall for anything.

name: WANTED!
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a Coin to your hand.
flavor: Wanted: Dead or Undead.

name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
flavor: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

name: Anka, the Buried
text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
flavor: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

name: Bazaar Mugger
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
flavor: Premium muggings at a discount price.

name: Bone Baron
text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
flavor: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

name: Crazed Chemist
text: Combo: Give a friendly minion +4 Attack.
flavor: You don't have to be crazy to work here, but it helps.

name: Cutting Class
text: [x]Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (1) less per Attack\nof your weapon.
flavor: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

name: Dark Iron Skulker
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Doctor Krastinov
text: Rush\nWhenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor: He is not a medical doctor.

name: Ethereal Peddler
text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards from another class, reduce their Cost by (2).
flavor: Yeah, sure. That Ragnaros "fell off the back of a truck".
howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Gral, the Shark
text: [x]Battlecry: Eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle: Add it to your hand.
flavor: “… We’re gonna need a bigger board.”

name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion.\n@(Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

name: Lotus Assassin
text: Stealth. Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain Stealth.
flavor: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

name: Malevolent Strike
text:
[x]Destroy a minion.
 Costs (1) less for each
_ card in your deck that
_ didn't start there.
flavor: "I don't know how those got in there, but I'm blaming you two."

name: Myra Rotspring
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\nDeathrattle minion. Also\ngain its Deathrattle.
flavor: On her first day on the job, Myra removed the smoke detectors.

name: Myra's Unstable Element
text: Draw the rest of\nyour deck.
flavor: What could go wrong?

name: Necrium Vial
text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
flavor: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

name: Ogre Ninja
text: Stealth\n50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor: He didn't have the grades to get into ninja school, but his dad pulled some strings.

name: Shado-Pan Rider
text: Combo: Gain +3 Attack.
flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

name: Shadow Sculptor
text: Combo: Draw a card for each card you've played this turn.
flavor: Carving out new territory in the realm of shadow puppetry.

name: Shadowcaster
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy to_your hand that costs_(1).
flavor: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.

name: Stowaway
text: [x]Battlecry: If there are cards\nin your deck that didn't start\nthere, draw 2 of them.
flavor: Cut him a break. Even economy class tickets are pretty expensive these days.

name: Vilespine Slayer
text: Combo: Destroy a minion.
flavor: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

name: Waxadred
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a Candle into your deck that resummons Waxadred when drawn.
flavor: Waxadred the dragon fought for his king, frolicking through the fields melting everything!

name: Candle Breath
text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3)_less while you're holding a Dragon.
flavor: "And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres!\n \nCome before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

name: Cannon Barrage
text: [x]Deal $3 damage to a\nrandom enemy. Repeat\nfor each of your Pirates.
flavor: Why fire your cannons strategically when you can fire them all at once?

name: Cursed Castaway
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Draw a Combo card from your deck.
flavor: She was an ordinary castaway... until she found that cursed volleyball.

name: Flik Skyshiv
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a\nminion and all copies of it\n(wherever they are).
flavor: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

name: Grand Empress Shek'zara
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your deck and draw all copies of it.
flavor: So is a Grand Empress an empress that's grand or an empress's empress?

name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
text: Battlecry: If you control a_Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
flavor: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

name: Kidnapper
text: Combo: Return a minion to_its owner's hand.
flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

name: Luckydo Buccaneer
text: Battlecry: If your weapon has at least 3 Attack, gain +4/+4.
flavor: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere.  You gotta keep 'em with you!  Especially in Gadgetzan!

name: Spectral Pillager
text: [x]Combo: Deal damage equal\nto the number of other cards\nyou've played this turn.
flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

name: Sprint
text: Draw 4 cards.
flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

name: Thistle Tea
text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

name: Trade Prince Gallywix
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.
flavor: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

name: Unidentified Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Cursed Vagrant
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/5 Shadow with Stealth.
flavor: Little did he know… it was really the talbuk leg that was cursed.

name: Galakrond, the Nightmare
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 card.\nIt costs (0).\n(@)
flavor: The enormous creature unfurled terrifying claws dripping with poisonous ichor. King Togwaggle was pleased, but inwardly disappointed the great Nightmare refused to wear the candle.

name: Gurubashi Hypemon
text: Battlecry: Discover a 1/1 copy of a Battlecry minion. It costs (1).
flavor: Throw your hands in the air!\nThey cost (1).

name: SI:7 Assassin
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each SI:7 card you've played this game. Combo: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: You can't keep the streets clean if you're afraid to get your hands dirty.

name: Tak Nozwhisker
text: [x]Whenever you shuffle a\ncard into your deck, add\na copy to your hand.
flavor: "One for me and one for future me!"

name: Captain Hooktusk
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Pirates from your deck. Give them Rush.
flavor: "You three! Get in the cannon!"

name: Tess Greymane
text: [x]Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

name: Anub'arak
text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

name: Blade of C'Thun
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to_your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

name: Valeera the Hollow
text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
flavor: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."
